SEARCH
Package edu.ucr.cs.pyneapple.utils.PRUCUtils

Class Area

java.lang.Object
edu.ucr.cs.pyneapple.utils.PRUCUtils.Area
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class Area extends Object implements Cloneable, Serializable
This class describes the Area class which is a spatial area that has numerical attribute and represented by a set of marginal coordinates
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Area

      public Area(int index, double sim_attr, double extensive_attr, double[] centroid)
      The Area class correspond to a spatial polygon, which is the basic unit in regionalization
      Parameters:
      index - the unique identifier of an area
      sim_attr - the similarity attribute
      extensive_attr - the extensive attribute
      centroid - the arrays of centroids for each of the spatial polygons

  • Method Details

    • compute_dist

      public double compute_dist(Area a)
      Compute the Euclidean between this area and area a based on their centroids
      Parameters:
      a - the area to compute distance with
      Returns:
      the Euclidean distance between this area and area a
